content.value: Hadley Palmer, who pleaded guilty to several felony charges in January, will be sentenced in August in Connecticut Superior Court in Stamford. A judge sealed records in her case last week.

entries.title: China Not SpaceX May Be Source of Rocket Crashing Into Moon

entries.summary: The developer of astronomy software who said that Elon Musk’s company would cause a new crater on the moon says that he “had really gotten it wrong.”

content.value: Astronomers believe the rocket piece that will crash into the moon next month came from a Chinese Long March 3C rocket, which launched in October 2014.
